ygData.subject: Re: RESEARCH
ygData.msgSnippet: Do *NOT* buy the tome of ancient restoration.  This book is a mistake and is being removed from the game.  You must use the Tome of Endless Enchantments (about
ygData.messageBody:
Do *NOT* buy the tome of ancient restoration. This book is a mistake and is
being removed from the game. You must use the Tome of Endless Enchantments
(about 10pp).

1> Tasarin's Pages are combine with a left and right half of the same page.
2> Velishoul's Pages are full pages and sequential, thus you combine page 8
and 9 to make a spell, etc.
3> Various Writs - these are so rare I have yet to hear of anyone having two
of them to try.

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath

> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] RESEARCH
>
>
> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>
> I was wondering for those who already do research. i am about to start, i
> got lots of pages about 13 i think hehe
> and i wanna make sure i am doing it right?
> i put a left and a right half into the book of ancient restoration right?
> what comes out? a spell????
> if not, what do i do next? and where can i buy the other books i
> might need?
>
> Aeramus (Bristlebane)
